title: [MC1.10]原版模组！！只需一条命令！！装逼神器！！点击就送屠龙宝刀，爆破弓，雷鸣弓
author: 博中
txt_content:
本帖最后由 博中 于 2017-1-26 11:11 编辑 

[MC1.10]原版模组～～～
点击就送屠龙宝刀，爆破弓，雷鸣弓！！！
今天给大家带来一个我原创的模组。


首先输入/give @p minecraft:command_block获得命令方块。


接着粘贴命令~


就会生成模组的核心~右键第一个告示牌获得模组物品~


爆破弓的截图~


雷鸣弓的截图~（因为闪电闪太快没截到，不过右下角可以证明有雷电）
这里有命令
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Time:1,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~ ~-1 ~ ~ ~13 ~ air},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~ ~ ~2 minecraft:wall_sign 0 replace {Text1:"{\"text\":\"右键清除模组\",\"color\":\"red\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/fill ~2 ~2 ~ ~-1 ~-2 ~5 air\"}}"}},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~2 minecraft:wall_sign 0 replace {Text1:"{\"text\":\"本模组由博中制作\",\"color\":\"dark_green\",\"clickEvent\":{\\"action\\":\\"run_command\\",\\"value\\":\\"/setblock ~ ~1 ~2 redstone_block\\"}}",Text2:"{\"text\":\"点击获得屠龙宝刀\",\"color\":\"dark_red\"}",Text3:"{\"text\":\"爆破弓，雷鸣弓\",\"color\":\"dark_red\"}"}},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/summon FallingSand ~1 ~-3 ~5 {Time:1,Data:2,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{auto:1,Command:/execute @e[score_A_min=1,score_A=1] ~ ~1 ~ /entitydata @e[type=Arrow,r=1] {CustomName:"A",life:1198}},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Data:2,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{auto:1,Command:/execute @e[score_B_min=1,score_B=1] ~ ~1 ~ /entitydata @e[type=Arrow,r=1] {CustomName:"B",life:1198}},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Data:2,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/give @p bow 1 0 {ench:[],display:{Name:"雷鸣弓",Lore:["由博中","独家赞助","什么鬼?"]}}}}]}]}},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/summon FallingSand ~1 ~-3 ~6 {Time:1,Data:2,Block:repeating_command_block,TileEntityData:{auto:1,Command:/scoreboard players set @a A 1 {SelectedItem:{id:minecraft:bow,tag:{ench:[],display:{Name:"雷鸣弓",Lore:["由博中","独家赞助","什么鬼?"]}}}}},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Data:2,Block:repeating_command_block,TileEntityData:{auto:1,Command:/scoreboard players set @a B 1 {SelectedItem:{id:minecraft:bow,tag:{ench:[],display:{Name:"爆破弓",Lore:["由博中","独家赞助","什么鬼?"]}}}}},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Data:2,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/give @p bow 1 0 {ench:[],display:{Name:"爆破弓",Lore:["由博中","独家赞助","什么鬼?"]}}}}]}]}},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/summon FallingSand ~ ~-4 ~6 {Time:1,Data:2,Block:repeating_command_block,TileEntityData:{auto:1,Command:/scoreboard players set @e[type=Arrow,name=A] C 1 {life:1199s}},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Data:2,Block:repeating_command_block,TileEntityData:{auto:1,Command:/scoreboard players set @e[type=Arrow,name=B] C 2 {life:1199s}},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Data:5,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/give @p minecraft:golden_sword 1 0 {ench:[{id:21,lvl:100}],display:{Name:"屠龙宝刀",Lore:["它的上一任","主人是博中"]},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.maxHealth",Name:"Test",Amount:10.0,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1l,UUIDMost:1l,Slot:"torso"},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:999999999,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:b}]}}}]}]}},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/summon FallingSand ~ ~-6 ~5 {Time:1,Data:4,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/execute @e[type=Arrow,name=A,score_C_min=1,score_C=1] ~ ~ ~ /summon LightningBolt},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Data:4,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/execute @e[type=Arrow,name=B,score_C_min=2,score_C=2] ~ ~ ~ /summon PrimedTnt},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Data:3,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/tellraw @p {"text":"欢迎使用本模组","color":"red"}}}]}]}},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/summon FallingSand ~1 ~-7 ~4 {Time:1,Data:4,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/execute @e[type=Arrow,name=A] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[r=3,type=!Arrow,score_A=0,score_A_min=0] ~ ~ ~ /summon LightningBolt},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Data:4,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/execute @e[type=Arrow,name=B] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[r=3,type=!Arrow,score_B=0,score_B_min=0] ~ ~ ~ /summon PrimedTnt}}]}},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/summon FallingSand ~ ~-8 ~4 {Time:1,Data:4,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard players set @e A 0},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Data:4,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard players set @e B 0},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Data:3,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~1 ~ ~ minecraft:air}}]}]}},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard objectives add C dummy},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard objectives add B dummy},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard objectives add A dummy},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:chain_command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~-1 ~-9 ~3 ~2 ~-13 ~7 glass 0 hollow},Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{auto:1b,Command:/gamerule commandBlockOutput false}}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}复制代码

当然少不了屠龙宝刀~
另外求人气，金粒。（做个模组不容易）
因为楼主找不到合适的录屏软件，所以暂时没有视频资源。（如果谁有免费高清无水印的录屏软件记得告诉楼主）
祝大家玩的开心，也希望大家支持我。原名：三年经验

replies.author: 高翔200408
replies.txt_content: 问楼主，MC1.11可以吗

replies.author: 高翔200408
replies.txt_content: 爆破弓有BUG，会爆炸个不停（在一直连发的情况下）

replies.author: 奶味钙片
replies.txt_content: 是我太落后了吗？好像比较新的版本mod都是命令方块？然而我还是最喜欢1.7.10~

replies.author: 叶米柯
replies.txt_content: 使用命令方块没法做到图灵完备，也就是说不能算Mod，只能算物品附加行为 =A=

replies.author: 黑键钢琴
replies.txt_content: Fraps可以录制而且没有水印。

replies.author: 博中
replies.txt_content:
黑键钢琴 发表于 2016-12-5 17:40
Fraps可以录制而且没有水印。
你可以把软件发给我吗？

replies.author: 博中
replies.txt_content:
高翔200408 发表于 2016-12-5 13:39
爆破弓有BUG，会爆炸个不停（在一直连发的情况下）
发现BUG。
爆破弓，连射或朝这脚下射。会导致一直爆炸。
解决办法：输入/kill @e[type=Arrow]

replies.author: Java_command
replies.txt_content:
不错，标题叹号有点多，希望更改一下……
这种标题容易吸引版主的注意233

replies.author: syz666
replies.txt_content: 这种蜜汁标题容易被别人以为是小学生吧。。而且有点low的感觉诶。

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content: 因为1.11改了很多实体名特别是FallingSand改成了falling_block导致1.11是无法使用这个原版命令方块模组。

replies.author: 雷鸣·翾鹗
replies.txt_content: wa雷鸣弓诶。。

replies.txt_content:

wa雷鸣弓诶。。
谢谢支持

replies.txt_content:
博中 发表于 2016-12-11 12:06

博中 发表于 2016-12-26 12:58
因为1.7没有@e这个选择器，所以原版无法实现
哦哦谢谢了

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
